title: Would Decorated Vermont State Trooper Arcot Ramathorn Be Affected by U.S. Entry Restrictions?
subtitle: Vermont state trooper Arcot Ramathorn is a fictional character and thus unaffected by U.S. entry restrictions.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Decorated Vermont state trooper Arcot Ramathorn, an Iraqi Muslim, would be denied entry under proposed U.S. travel restrictions.
